text: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
author: Anonymous

text: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

text: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
author: Anonymous

text: I haven't slept for ten days, because that would be too long.
author: Mitch Hedberg

text: The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
author: Anonymous

text: I used to hate facial hair, but then it grew on me.
author: Anonymous

text: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
author: Anonymous

text: I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
author: Anonymous

text: Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers? He'll stop at nothing to avoid them.
author: Anonymous

text: I don't have a girlfriend, but I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.
author: Mitch Hedberg

text: I asked the librarian if the library had any books on paranoia. She whispered, 'They're right behind you.'
author: Anonymous

text: My doctor told me I needed to break a sweat once a day so I told him I'd have a spicy burrito.
author: Anonymous

text: I'm not saying my wife's a bad cook, but she uses a smoke alarm as a timer.
author: Anonymous

text: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
author: Anonymous

text: I'm great at multitasking. I can waste time, be unproductive, and procrastinate all at once.
author: Anonymous

text: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.
author: Anonymous

text: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
author: Anonymous

text: I'm not lazy, I'm just on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

text: I don't need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
author: Anonymous

text: I finally got eight hours of sleep. It took me three days, but whatever.
author: Anonymous
